apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts two women sharing a tender kiss, rendered with Apple's signature soft rounded edges and vibrant color gradients.  The skin tones, a delicate light and a warm medium-dark, are meticulously shaded with glossy 3D effects, creating a palpable sense of closeness and affection.  This heartwarming representation, brought to life with realistic lighting, beautifully conveys romantic love and intimate connection in digital conversations.
